review: So nice to have the stick rather than the box, I've been using Roku since the beginning and really like the user interface and the great selection of channels.  I bought this for my motorhome, plug it in and forget it. No cables to worry about no need to find a space for the box.  It's perfect.
author: Mema "Wife, Mother, Mema, Sister"

review: I'm ditching my Apple TVs (all 3 of them) and getting Roku for all my TVs. The fast forward and rewind features, alone, make it worth it not to mention the ease with which it plays all of my streaming media. I have yet to see it pause or have issues with the audio & video getting out of sync. It just works!  Wow, I had no idea streaming media could be this good....and this one is using the wireless signal (my Apple TVs are wired into my network).  I can't speak to the difference between the Roku stick and the box, but I can tell you that the Google Chromecast device sucks even worse, and this device blows both of them away. All of these years that I've been loyal to Apple products, and I had no idea how much better life could be (ha!).
author: Bethany Jenkins "B. Jenkins"

review: Fast shipping. I liked the price. I had the streaming box so had to try the stick. Love it, no wires!
author: Kindle Customer

Netflix/Roku, please fix this.
